scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix part3/phonebook/front && npm run build --prefix part3/phonebook/front
scripts.server: npm install --prefix part3/phonebook/server && npm start --prefix part3/phonebook/server
scripts.front: npm install --prefix part3/phonebook/front && npm run build --prefix part3/phonebook/front
